contest_modal.title: Calling all Builders!
contest_modal.subtitle: Submit your most creative scenes, and earn a share of the purse: 900K+ MANA and 50 LAND (over 50K USD!)
contest_modal.start: Subscribe for a chance to win LAND

add_to_contest.title: Add project to contest
add_to_contest.subtitle: Almost done. Review your information and before submitting it.
add_to_contest.success_subtitle: Your project looks really nice, thank you for your submission!

title.length: Title length must be between {min} and {max} characters.

description.length: Description length must be between {min} and {max} characters.

custom_layout_modal.subtitle_one: You can create custom layouts for your scene.
custom_layout_modal.subtitle_two: Enter values in the boxes below for the desired size.

project_layout_picker.max_area_error: Your scene can't have more than {area} parcels

tutorial_modal.title: Get started with the Builder
tutorial_modal.subtitle: The Builder is super easy to use, here are some tips before you begin
tutorial_modal.slide0: Browse the categories on the right and drag-and-drop the item you want into your scene.
tutorial_modal.slide1: To orient the camera, click and drag on the viewport. Use the arrow keys to move around.
tutorial_modal.slide2: Click and drag an item to move it.
tutorial_modal.slide3: If you need more precise control, click the Move icon on the toolbar and use the arrows to manipulate the item.

toasts.localstorage: Projects automatically save to local storage
